casebody.data:
Edna Masarjian v. Albert Masarjian (9805)

Spallone, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued June 3 decision released June 25, 1991 Raymond T. Connor, with whom, on the brief, was Christopher T. Godialis, certified legal intern, for the appellant (defendant). Dianne M. Andersen, with whom, on the brief, was Melissa A. Granel, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
